about.engagement: More than just a butcher shop, we are a place of trust, where people come as much for the exceptional quality of our products as to share our passion for meat.
about.intro: Boucherie Vaz was born in 2025 with a clear idea: quality above all. Every meat we offer is the result of artisanal know-how and selected with high standards.
about.promiseText: Located in the heart of the butchery tradition, our shop is your new gourmet address in Vallorbe. We select our meats with the greatest care to guarantee freshness, taste, and tenderness.

legalContent.termsText: Since our products are perishable goods, returns are not accepted after sale, except in the case of a manifest quality defect found at the time of collection or delivery.

privacyContent.title: Privacy & Data Protection Policy
privacyContent.dataText: In accordance with the nLPD (new Federal Data Protection Act in Switzerland), we are committed to protecting your personal data. Data collected via our contact form is only used to respond to your requests and is never transmitted to third parties.
privacyContent.cookiesText: We only use technical cookies necessary for the proper functioning of the site (for example, to remember your choice of language or your consent to cookies). We do not use advertising or third-party tracking cookies.
privacyContent.rightsText: You have the right to request access to your data, its correction or deletion. If you have any questions, contact us at the email address indicated in the legal notice.
